chapters.name: Tour
chapters.description: During the assault on the TerraGroup office, a massive explosion erupted on top of one of the nearby high-rises. I got left on my own, with no contact with command. Looks like I'll have to handle the evacuation myself. But first things first, I have to get out of this Ground Zero.

objectives.description: Escape Ground Zero
Talk to Therapist
Ensure access to the Streets of Tarkov

options.description: Hand over the cash to Therapist
Collect the required 250,000 Roubles

objectives.description: Talk to Ragman
Survive and extract from Interchange
Tell Ragman what you found during the recon
Talk to Skier
Survive and extract from Customs
Hand over any 5 found in raid building materials items to Skier

Find any 5 items in raid from the building materials category

Survive and extract from Factory
Hand over any 2 found in raid weapons to Mechanic

options.description: Hand over weapons to Mechanic

options.description: Hand over 20,000 USD to Mechanic
Collect the required 20,000 USD

objectives.description: Ensure access to Reserve

chapters.name: Falling Skies
chapters.description: Mechanic and I got to talking about that plane that went down somewhere in the nature reserve. Nobody really knows what happened to it. I should track it down and take a look â€” maybe I'll find something interesting.
chapters.requirements: Ask Mechanic about the downed plane while progressing through the story chapter Tour

objectives.description: Locate the fallen plane
Reach Loyalty Level 2 with Prapor
Ask the traders about the fallen plane
Hand over 2,000 USD to Therapist to learn details about the SUV
Retrieve the flash drive from one of the G-Wagon SUVs
Hand over the flash drive to Prapor
Wait for information from Prapor
Retrieve the plane's flight recorder
Leave the flight recorder in the specified spot
Visit Prapor
Hand over 3 found in raid Rechargeable batteries
Hand over 5 found in raid Printed circuit boards
Hand over 2 found in raid Toolsets
Wait for information from Prapor
Hand over the flight crew's transcript to Prapor
Hand over Elektronik's secure flash drive to Prapor
Wait for information from Prapor

rewards.condition: Answer 'yes' when Prapor asks if you read the transcript

objectives.description: Retrieve the armored case
Find any additional clues
Keep the armored case for yourself or hand it over to Prapor

options.description: Keep the armored case
Hand over the armored case directly to Prapor
Pretend you didn't find the armored case, but still hand it over to Prapor

chapters.name: Batya
chapters.description: Turns out BEAR didn't send just regular squads into Tarkov, there were real SOF guys here. I'd like to know more about those units and what exactly they were doing.
chapters.requirements: Visit one of the BEAR outpost locations (Customs scav base, Reserve radar, Shoreline bunker, or Woods USEC camp)

objectives.description: Locate the traces of the BEAR special squad (check BEAR outposts)
Learn more about the Bogatyr squad from the traders
Locate the Gnezdo outpost
objectives.note: The outpost is in the forest on the western side of the Ultra mall

objectives.description: Figure out what happened to the Bogatyr squad
Learn more about the Bogatyr squad's members
Locate the Ryabina outpost
objectives.note: It should be somewhere on the ridge in the Priozersk forest, it was used as an observation point

objectives.description: Find more information about the Bogatyr squad (search large stores or shopping malls)
Locate the Carousel outpost

Intelligence Center level 3
Contact the Bogatyr squad

objectives.description: Bring all of Bogatyr squad's items to Lightkeeper
Wait for Voevoda to reach out

objectives.description: Investigate the cultist circle on Reserve

chapters.name: Accidental Witness
chapters.description: Next to the dorms, there's a sedan with a threatening message left on it. It seems one of the residents had a serious debt. But this Kozlov was probably not the only debtor in the industrial zone. Perhaps he was being hunted for a reason?
chapters.requirements: Locate the scribbled over car in the courtyard of the dormitories on Customs

objectives.description: Figure out where Kozlov lived
Read the note on Kozlov's door
objectives.note: Two-story dorms, room 110 door

objectives.description: Find out what Kozlov was involved in
Access Kozlov's room
objectives.note: Dorm room 110 key required

objectives.description: Figure out where to get Kozlov's key
Ask the traders about Anastasia
Access Skier's accomplice's apartment
objectives.note: Zmeisky building 3, apartment 7

objectives.description: Find the key to the apartment
objectives.note: Zmeisky 3 apartment key

objectives.description: Learn more about Skier's accomplice's apartment

objectives.note: Documents spawn on armchair, under TV, in kitchen, on wall, on windowsill

objectives.description: Report to Skier
Talk to Ragman
Locate Anastasia's apartment
objectives.note: One door to the right of Chek 13 entrance

Learn more about Anastasia
objectives.note: Check mailbox near entrance for letter and newspaper

objectives.description: Locate courier Pasha

objectives.description: Investigate Reshala's bunkhouse
objectives.note: Find three items: one on wall beside door, one on wall beside far bed, one on chair

objectives.description: Locate Kozlov's hideout

objectives.description: Locate and obtain Kozlov's evidence
objectives.note: Exit building, turn right, tape below shovel in planters

chapters.name: They Are Already Here
chapters.description: I came across a strange note mentioning the Eye of the World and some kind of cult. I need to find out more about this group and what they're planning.
chapters.requirements: Pick up and read Note about the Eye of the World from marked rooms on Customs, Reserve, Woods, or Shoreline island house

objectives.description: Find 'Note about the Eye of the World'
objectives.note: Can be found in marked rooms (Customs 314, Reserve RB-BK/RB-PKPM/RB-VO, Woods village, Shoreline island)

objectives.description: Locate a place connected to the Eye of the World
Locate the cult victim's apartment
objectives.note: Collapsed cultist house in abandoned village

objectives.description: Obtain the key to the apartment
objectives.note: Cult victim's apartment key - 4 spawn locations in the house

objectives.description: Obtain and read the book that the cultists planted with Igor
objectives.note: Book of the Arrival in apartment north of Stylobate extract

objectives.description: Investigate the victim's apartment
Obtain the victim's first audio tape
objectives.note: Cult victim audio tape #1 on Igor's desk

objectives.description: Ask Mechanic about the Eye of the World
Locate and neutralize 2 Cultist Priests
Obtain more information on the Eye of the World
objectives.note: Cultist priest's note in marked rooms (Customs 314, Reserve RB-BK/RB-VO)

objectives.description: Locate the place marked with the Eye of the World on Lighthouse
objectives.note: Blue chalet upstairs, note on balcony. Key on ATV by garage

objectives.description: Locate the place marked with the Eye of the World on Woods
objectives.note: Abandoned village, newspaper clipping in poster room

objectives.description: Locate the place marked with the Eye of the World on Shoreline
objectives.note: Radio tower at Road to customs. Bring Toolset to repair tower (60s)

objectives.description: Learn more about Station 14-4 KORD from Mechanic
objectives.note: Mechanic gives Secure Flash drive after talking

objectives.description: Craft Station 14-4 KORD Arshavin K. pass (Restored) in Intelligence Center
objectives.note: Requires 6 hours, needs Secure Flash drive, Military flash drive, VPX Flash Storage Module

objectives.description: Access ARRS Station 14-4 on Interchange
objectives.note: Power station basement, turn on power first, use KORD pass

objectives.description: Place Secure Flash drive on the servers in cooling room
objectives.note: Takes 30 seconds, flip switch in cooling room

objectives.description: Collect Mysterious Audio Tape from the safe
objectives.note: Safe opens after placing flash drive

objectives.description: Return to ARRS Station 14-4 and access lower server room
objectives.note: Use pass to restore power, press button under desk, collect USB from server

objectives.description: Give ARRS USB drive to Mechanic
Read the ARRS station Specifications from Mechanic
objectives.note: Sent via message

chapters.name: Blue Fire
chapters.description: During the raid on the office, some kind of special weapon went off on one of the roofs... I remember a bright blue flash before I blacked out. After that, all the electronics failed. I've never encountered such a powerful EMP weapon before. I need to find out what technology hit the city, and who's behind it.
chapters.requirements: Pick up and read EMERCOM leaflet from Woods EMERCOM camp, Interchange tents, or ULTRA EMERCOM unit

objectives.description: Talk to Mechanic about the EMP Blast
Locate and obtain the device fragment
objectives.note: Check Chek 13 marked room or Upper LexOS area on Streets of Tarkov

objectives.description: Talk to Mechanic to get a hacking device
Plant the hacking device in the server room in The Lab
objectives.note: 1st floor server room next to Black Keycard doors, takes 60 seconds

objectives.description: Hand over the fragment of Item 1156 to Mechanic or keep it

options.description: Hand over the fragment to Mechanic
Keep the fragment for yourself

objectives.description: Find a lead on item 1156
objectives.note: TerraGroup offices or facilities - Ground Zero or The Lab

objectives.note: 2nd floor office #4, requires TerraGroup science office key

objectives.description: Read note in The Lab office
objectives.note: Office above Streets passage, closest to yellow keycard room

objectives.description: Investigate the Rus Post office
objectives.note: Primorsky Avenue opposite Pinewood Hotel

objectives.description: Collect 3 audio tapes from Rus Post office
objectives.note: Front desk, water cooler, and office room

objectives.description: Find Rus Post car key

chapters.name: The Ticket
chapters.description: This chapter determines your ending path based on choices made with the armored case from Falling Skies. Multiple branching paths lead to different endings: Savior, Debtor, Fallen, or Survivor.
chapters.requirements: Complete Falling Skies storyline - choice between keeping or handing over the armored case to Prapor
chapters.note: This is a complex multi-path storyline with 4 possible endings. The path splits based on your choices regarding the armored case and working with Mr. Kerman.

objectives.description: Obtain Intelligence Center level 1
Talk to Mr. Kerman via Intelligence Center
objectives.note: Kerman contacts you after unlocking IC level 1

handed_to_prapor.description: If you handed the armored case to Prapor in Falling Skies

objectives.description: Wait for Mr. Kerman to reach out
Locate the camp of Prapor's people on Lighthouse
objectives.note: Near lighthouse island, opposite basketball courts chalet

objectives.description: Find clues about Prapor's people's intentions
objectives.note: Note near sandbags in crate stack

objectives.description: Gain access to Lightkeeper
objectives.note: Unlocks Network Provider Part 1 quest, bypasses normal Lightkeeper requirements

kept_case.description: If you kept the armored case for yourself

objectives.description: Ask Mechanic for help opening the case
Obtain the experimental signal jammer
objectives.note: 3 spawns: residential unit, R21 recreational area, or R16 lecture hall

objectives.description: Unlock the armored case in Workbench
objectives.note: Requires 55 hours uninterrupted power

objectives.description: Read the instructions from the armored case
objectives.note: Contains Kruglov's RFID Keycard and manual

objectives.description: Choose to continue working with Mr. Kerman or refuse

continue_kerman.description: Continue working with Mr. Kerman (leads to Savior or Debtor endings)

objectives.description: Obtain RFID card encryption device
objectives.note: After 30+ min in Lab, Kerman says Raiders looted it

objectives.description: Contact Mechanic about Elektronik
Wait for Mechanic's response (1 day)
Hand over 40 Physical Bitcoins to Mechanic
objectives.note: All at once, not FiR required. Receive Elektronik's key

objectives.description: Collect RFID card encryption device from Klimova 14A apartment 2
objectives.note: Under coffee table, next to Lab transit

objectives.description: Obtain Blank RFID Keycard
objectives.note: From Scavs, Bosses, marked rooms, or Kruglov's safe

objectives.description: Obtain TerraGroup Labs master keycard
objectives.note: Kruglov's office safe, requires Black keycard

objectives.description: Activate Kruglov's RFID keycard at Intelligence Center
objectives.note: Takes up to 39 hours with uninterrupted power

objectives.description: Swipe the activated keycard at Terminal intercom
objectives.note: Use scanner underneath intercom box

objectives.description: Choose ending path: Help Kerman find evidence (Savior), Change mind (Debtor), or access Terminal

savior_ending.description: Help Mr. Kerman find evidence on TerraGroup

objectives.description: Intelligence Center level 3
Deliver 8 major TerraGroup evidences to Mr. Kerman
objectives.note: Requires completing all other storylines

items.item: Transcript of conversation with Ms. A.

items.source: They Are Already Here - from Mechanic

objectives.description: Wait for Fence to reach out (36-48 hours)
Complete Fence's assignment (PvE or PvP variant)
objectives.note: Must not kill any Scavs during this

options.description: PvE: Eliminate 5 PMCs on Shoreline and Interchange in single raids
PvP: Extract via Co-Op extracts on Woods and Reserve

objectives.description: Reach 0.4 standing with BTR Driver
objectives.note: Complete The Price of Independence quest

objectives.description: Craft Reprogrammed RFID keycard with Kerman's hash codes
objectives.note: Requires Solar Power, takes up to 9 hours

objectives.description: Access Terminal between 22:00-04:00 with evidence container
objectives.note: Bring Secure container Alpha-1 with TerraGroup evidence

objectives.description: Extract on Zubr boat to complete ending

rewards.name: Savior Ending with cutscene and credits

chapters.name: The Unheard
chapters.description: I came across a strange note on a TerraGroup sheet. It mentions the will of The Unheard and some fuel needed for 'purification'. TerraGroup's definitely involved in this, and I should gather more information about The Unheard.
chapters.requirements: Pick up Note with ramblings about the Purification from TerraGroup security post, TG office on Streets, or TG building on Ground Zero

objectives.description: Learn more about the Unheard
objectives.note: Investigate local TerraGroup offices

objectives.description: Learn more about TerraGroup's activities
objectives.note: Find 2 documents: Document on changes in the lab (dome area) and Cargo transport fax (dark office)

items.item: Document on changes in the lab

objectives.description: Find more information about the special catalyst shipment
objectives.note: Transport log with notes next to med tent and hole

objectives.description: Locate Rzhevsky's service vehicle
objectives.note: Main road outside Aspect building next to LexOS

objectives.description: Retrieve the data from the hard drive in Rzhevsky's car
objectives.note: Front left door, central console

objectives.description: Retrieve data from HDD at Intelligence Center
objectives.note: Requires 1 Printer paper, 3 PCB, 2 PC CPU. Takes up to 12 hours

objectives.description: Locate and obtain the documents on the Blue Ice fuel catalyst research
objectives.note: TerraGroup storage room - 2 documents with multiple spawns

objectives.description: Search for any mention of A.P. in The Lab
objectives.note: Whiteboard in office opposite Red Keycard room

objectives.description: Learn more about A.P.'s activities and role
objectives.note: 2 audio tapes in lecture room underneath cafeteria

objectives.description: Locate A.P.'s room in the Health Resort
objectives.note: East wing room 305, door unlocked

objectives.description: Obtain A.P.'s personal belongings and data storage device

items.item: Sliderkey flash drive marked with A.P.

objectives.description: Decrypt the flash drive from A.P.'s room
objectives.note: Requires 3 RAM, 1 Virtex, 3 CPU fans. Takes up to 12 hours

objectives.description: Ask Mechanic for help with decrypted flash drive
objectives.note: Mechanic asks for 5,000,000 roubles

objectives.description: Wait for the news from Elektronik
objectives.note: Kerman contacts you in hideout

objectives.description: Integrate the tech files from A.P.'s flash drive into a TerraGroup keycard
objectives.note: Craft Reprogrammed keycard (Green) at Intelligence Center

objectives.description: Access A.P.'s corporate apartment
objectives.note: Cardinal apartment building, 2nd floor left

objectives.description: Access the hidden room in A.P.'s apartment
objectives.note: Storage room with keypad, use Green keycard

objectives.description: Collect 4 items from hidden room

items.item: Copy of report for TG Worldwide
Document on changes in enterprise interactions

chapters.name: The Labyrinth
chapters.description: A facility of one of TerraGroup's contractors, Knossos LLC. According to public sources, they build amusement and theme parks. However, this place looks more like a heavily fortified bunker than a new theme park. I need to investigate this labyrinth and find out what TerraGroup was really doing here.
chapters.requirements: Obtain Labrys access keycard and Knossos LLC facility key to access via Shoreline Health Resort west wing basement transit

objectives.description: Obtain Labrys access keycard
objectives.note: Required to access The Labyrinth location

objectives.description: Obtain Knossos LLC facility key
objectives.note: Opens transit door in Shoreline Health Resort

objectives.description: Access The Labyrinth via Shoreline transit
objectives.note: West wing basement transit

objectives.description: Escape your spawn chamber
objectives.note: 5 different spawn chambers with unique hazards/traps to solve

objectives.description: Defeat Shadow of Tagilla
objectives.note: Boss that spawns tripwires and patrols the labyrinth

objectives.description: Defeat Vengeful Killa
objectives.note: Appears after Shadow of Tagilla dies

objectives.description: Navigate through the labyrinth traps
objectives.note: Avoid tripwires, poisoned barbed wire, and spike pits

objectives.description: Locate the facility research documents
objectives.note: Search observation rooms and corpse rooms

objectives.description: Extract via Ariadne's Path or The Way Up
objectives.note: Ariadne's Path requires Ariadne symbol key. The Way Up opens 15min after raid start

objectives.description: Retrieve Labyrinth facility research report
objectives.note: After completing Labyrinth, find report at pier area under bridge pillar

rewards.note: Major evidence for The Ticket - final piece
High-tier loot from Tagilla and Killa bosses
